    com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core  

    • Uses of ILPMessage in com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core

      Subinterfaces of ILPMessage in com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ILPLocalNotification
      A local notification is a communication (generally marketing related) sent from the server.
      Methods in com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core that return ILPMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ILPMessage ILPMessageProvider.getMessage(ILPID id)
      Returns a message with the given identifier.
      Methods in com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core that return types with arguments of type ILPMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<ILPMessage> ILPMessageProvider.getMessages()
      Returns all messages known to this provider.
      List<ILPMessage> ILPMessageProvider.getMessages(ILPFilter filter, ILPOrdering ordering)
      Returns all messages filtered by the given filter and sorted by the given ordering.
      Methods in com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core with parameters of type ILPMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ILPMessageListener.onAdd(ILPMessage message)
      Informs this listener that a new message has been added to the message provider associated with the application.
      void ILPMessageListener.onModify(ILPMessage message)
      Informs this listener that a message already known to the message provider associated with the application was modified in some way.
